Moves.Description: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

Abilities.Name: Strong Jaw
Abilities.Description: Increases the damage of the user's Biting moves by 50%.

Abilities.Name: Shell Armor
Abilities.Description: The user is protected from critical hits.

Abilities.Name: Swift Swim
Abilities.Description: Doubles the Speed of the user in rain.

Moves.Name: Headbutt
Moves.Description: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. This may also make the target flinch.

Moves.Name: Water Gun
Moves.Description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

Moves.Name: Bite
Moves.Description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

Moves.Name: Counter
Moves.Description: A retaliatory attack that counters any physical move, inflicting double the damage taken.

Abilities.Name: Ripen
Abilities.Description: The user ripens Berries doubles their effectiveness.

Abilities.Name: Gluttony
Abilities.Description: The user will use a Berry when its HP drop below 50%, which is earlier than usual.

Abilities.Name: Bulletproof
Abilities.Description: Protects the user from bullet, ball, and bomb moves.

Moves.Name: Sucker Punch
Moves.Description: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.

Moves.Name: Astonish
Moves.Description: The user attacks the target by crying out in a startling fashion. This may also make the target flinch.

Moves.Name: Rollout
Moves.Description: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. This attack becomes more powerful each time it hits.

Moves.Name: Defense Curl
Moves.Description: The user curls up and boosts its Defense stat.

Abilities.Name: Sand Spit
Abilities.Description: The user creates a Sandstorm whenever it gets hit by an attack.

Abilities.Name: Shed Skin
Abilities.Description: The user has a 33% chance of healing from status conditions at the end of each turn.

Abilities.Name: Sand Veil
Abilities.Description: Increases the user's Evasion by one stage during a Sandstorm.

Moves.Name: Bulldoze
Moves.Description: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stats of those hit.

Moves.Name: Brutal Swing
Moves.Description: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.

Moves.Name: Headbutt
Moves.Description: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. This may also make the target flinch.

Moves.Name: Coil
Moves.Description: The user coils up and concentrates. This boosts its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.

Abilities.Name: Rattled
Abilities.Description: Increases the user's Speed by one stage if the user gets hit by a Bug-type, Ghost-type, or Dark-type move or if the user gets Intimidated.

Abilities.Name: Static
Abilities.Description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze opponents that come into direct contact with the user.

Abilities.Name: Klutz
Abilities.Description: The user cannot use any held items except those that affect experience, EVs, prize money, and friendship.

Moves.Name: Nuzzle
Moves.Description: The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks against the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

Moves.Name: Tearful Look
Moves.Description: The user gets teary-eyed to make the target lose its combative spirit. This lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

Moves.Name: Acid
Moves.Description: Opposing Pokémon are attacked with a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stats.

Moves.Name: Flail
Moves.Description: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. The less HP the user has, the greater the move's power.

Abilities.Name: Healer
Abilities.Description: Has a 30% chance to cure an ally's status condition at the end of a turn.

Abilities.Name: Anticipation
Abilities.Description: This ability warns the user if their opponent knows a 1-hit KO or super effective move.

Abilities.Name: Magic Bounce
Abilities.Description: The user reflects moves that change the status of Pokemom.

Moves.Name: Confusion
Moves.Description: The target is hit with a weak telekinetic force to inflict damage. This may also confuse the target.

Moves.Name: Disarming Voice
Moves.Description: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

Moves.Name: Magical Leaf
Moves.Description: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target. This attack never misses.

Moves.Name: Thunder Wave
Moves.Description: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.

Abilities.Name: Shield Dust
Abilities.Description: The user blocks the additional effects of attacks it receives.

Abilities.Name: Ice Scales
Abilities.Description: Reduces the damage taken by the user from Special Attacks.

Moves.Name: Powder Snow
Moves.Description: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. This may also leave opposing Pokémon frozen.

Moves.Name: Struggle Bug
Moves.Description: The user attacks by struggling against opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Sp. Atk stats.

Moves.Name: Icy Wind
Moves.Description: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also lowers opposing Pokémon's Speed stats.

Abilities.Name: Aroma Veil

Abilities.Name: Gluttony
Abilities.Description: The user will use a Berry when its HP drop below 50%, which is earlier than usual.

Abilities.Name: Thick Fat

Moves.Name: Echoed Voice

Moves.Name: Covet

Moves.Name: Tail Whip

Moves.Name: Assurance
Moves.Description: This move's power is doubled if the target has already taken some damage in the same turn.

Moves.Name: String Shot
